ProjectTitle: An alternative route to widespread fears: the effects of fear learning on perceptual discrimination
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/02/2023
Data: please provide some more detail about the different datasets, what kind of data are you collecting, e.g. interviews, tests/measurements, surveys, patient characteristics, plasma samples, code etc. 
Ethics: You mention ethics approval GZEK 2020-43 which does not look like a nr from KU Leuven, is this a typo? If from outside KU Leuven please also submit a PRET application if you work with personal data (including pseudonymous data) at KU Leuven. For more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/index
Storage: Please clarify where you will store your data, do not store any datasets containing personal data openly on OSF, make sure to use the storage solutions approved by SMEC. For more information see: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Please note that KU Leuven has a data repository RDR that you can use for data sharing (under access restrictions if you data is not fully anonymous): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
